mainBoard.name: Earthquake

mainBoard.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

foreignData.name: Vorzeichen
foreignData.text:
Schaue Dir die obersten drei Karten der Bibliothek eines Spielers Deiner Wahl an.
Mische diese Bibliothek neu oder lege diese Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück auf die Bibliothek. Ziehe eine Karte zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Portent
mainBoard.originalText: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Shuffle that library or put those three cards back on top of it in any order. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.

rulings.text: This does not cause a player to lose if they have less than 3 cards in their library. It allows you to look at and reorder or shuffle whatever remaining cards there might be.

mainBoard.text:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

foreignData.name: Kraftverlust
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl, wenn dessen Urheber nicht sofort X ausgibt. Wenn er dies nicht tut, tappe alle manaproduzierenden Länder, die dieser Spieler kontrolliert und entleere seinen Manavorrat.

mainBoard.name: Power Sink
mainBoard.originalText:
Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional o
X. If he or she does not, tap all mana-producing lands that player controls and remove all mana from his or her mana pool.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

foreignData.name: Brennende Berührung
foreignData.text:
Rückkauf 4
Die Brennende Berührung fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Searing Touch
mainBoard.originalText:
Buyback o4 (You may pay an additional o4 when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Searing Touch deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mainBoard.text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Searing Touch deals 1 damage to any target.

mainBoard.name: Impulse
mainBoard.originalText: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library. Shuffle your library afterwards.

rulings.text: Due to errata, you no longer shuffle your library.
This is not a draw.

mainBoard.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

foreignData.name: Einäscherung
foreignData.text: Die Einäscherung fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Kreaturen, denen die Einäscherung in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat, können nicht regenerieren.

mainBoard.name: Incinerate
mainBoard.originalText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Creatures damaged by Incinerate cannot regenerate this turn.

rulings.text: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won’t do anything. The creature can’t be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

mainBoard.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath

foreignData.name: Auflösung

mainBoard.name: Dissipate
mainBoard.originalText: Counter target spell. Remove that spell card from the game.

rulings.text: If the spell is not countered (because the spell it targets can't be countered), then it does not get exiled.
The card does not go to the graveyard before being exiled.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."
—Ertai, wizard adept

mainBoard.originalText: Bury all artifacts, creatures, and lands.
mainBoard.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You've failed Gerrard. You've failed the Legacy. You've failed yourself. I can do no more."
—Volrath, to Karn

foreignData.name: Propaganda
foreignData.text: Kreaturen können nicht angreifen, wenn ihr Beherrscher nicht zusätzlich {2} für diese Kreatur bezahlt.

mainBoard.name: Propaganda
mainBoard.originalText: Each turn, each creature cannot attack you unless its controller pays an additional o2 for that creature.

rulings.text: If there are multiple attacks in a turn, then you have to pay for each attack.
If there is more than one Propaganda on the battlefield, the cost is cumulative.
Paying this cost is not an instant or any other kind of ability, it is an additional cost on the declaration of the attacker.
The payment is made during the declare attackers step at the same time you are declaring the attacker.
In the Two-Headed Giant format, you still only have to pay once per creature.
Unless some effect explicitly says otherwise, a creature that can't attack you can still attack a planeswalker you control.

mainBoard.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um {U} und ein farbloses Mana.

U and one colorless mana to your mana pool.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

foreignData.name: Hydroknall
foreignData.text:
Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl, wenn er rot ist, oder zerstöre eine bleibende Karte Deiner Wahl, wenn sie rot ist.
Spiele diesen Zauberspruch als Spontanzauber, wenn er auf eine bleibende Karte zielt.

sideBoard.name: Hydroblast
sideBoard.originalText: Counter target spell if it is red, or destroy target permanent if it is red. (If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can’t be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.
Hydroblast can target any spell or permanent, not just a red one. It checks the color of the target only on resolution.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

foreignData.name: Pyroknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl, wenn er blau ist, oder zerstöre eine bleibende Karte Deiner Wahl, wenn sie blau ist. Spiele diesen Zauberspruch als Spontanzauber, wenn er auf eine bleibende Karte zielt.

sideBoard.name: Pyroblast
sideBoard.originalText: Counter target spell if it is blue, or destroy target permanent if it is blue. (If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can’t be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.
Pyroblast can target any spell or permanent, not just a blue one. It checks the color of the target only on resolution.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

sideBoard.flavorText: This spell, like many attributed to Drafna, was actually the work of his wife and former student, Hurkyl.

foreignData.name: Hurkyls Erinnerung
foreignData.text: Bringe alle Artefakte im Spiel, die ein Spieler Deiner Wahl besitzt, auf seine Hand zurück.

sideBoard.name: Hurkyl's Recall
sideBoard.originalText: Return to target player's hand all artifacts in play he or she owns.

rulings.text: It only returns artifacts which are on the battlefield.
Retrieves all artifacts owned by the target player regardless of who controls them. Ignores artifacts owned by other players even if target player has control of them.

sideBoard.text: Return all artifacts target player owns to their hand.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"Although I would give my life to protect Gerrard, my conscience will not let me take another's. There are many who would not hesitate."
—Karn, silver golem

foreignData.name: Stahlgolem
foreignData.text: Du kannst keine Beschwörungszauber oder Artefaktkreaturen sprechen.

sideBoard.name: Steel Golem
sideBoard.originalText: You cannot play summon or artifact creature spells.

rulings.text: Yes, this only affects you.
You can put creatures onto the battlefield by means other than casting them.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

foreignData.name: Nevinyrrals Wunderscheibe
foreignData.text:
Nevinyrrals Wunderscheibe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
1, {T}: Zerstöre alle Artefakte, Kreaturen und Verzauberungen.

sideBoard.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
sideBoard.originalText:
Nevinyrral's Disk comes into play tapped.
o1, oc
T: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

rulings.text: You don't sacrifice Nevinyrral's Disk to activate its ability. It's destroyed as part of the ability's resolution if it's still on the battlefield. If an effect gives Nevinyrral's Disk indestructible or regenerates it, it stays on the battlefield.

sideBoard.text:
Nevinyrral's Disk enters tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
